# modules

<dl>
<dt> Instance of </dt><dd markdown="1">
 [`Object`]({{site.baseurl}}\built-ins\Object) 
</dd>
</dl>

### Description

Object containing information about all imported source files in the 
same form as in the `module` object.

### Example

```js
console.log(modules);
/* Possible output:
21-06-2022 12:00:00 {
    "repl": {
        "name": "repl",
        "filename": "repl.ez",
        "path": "C:\\Easypt2\\library"
    }
}
*/
```
